CommentBody:
need info on the username and pc from the DB
 
select * from clientmachine where name = 'lt302';
select * from clientmachine where name = 'lt303';
 
enable logs on the pcs and update the policies and gather the log files

enable server logs: vim /EPPServer/sieratool/webservice/webservice.php
DEBUG_VERBOSITY to 1017
 
tail -f /EPPServer/sieratool/log/WebService.log
 
and update the policies on both pcs

the 303 computer disappears from the DB completely when the issue reproduces (the user is also wrong as it shows the user for 302)
once the policies were updated from collecting logs the computer appeared in the DB
waiting for the log files to be uploaded
